title.value: Do LLMs Meet the Needs of Software Tutorial Writers? Opportunities and Design Implications
title.justification: The title captures the focus of the paper, which is investigating the role and effectiveness of Large Language Models (LLMs) in assisting software tutorial writers.
title.quote: Do LLMs Meet the Needs of Software Tutorial Writers? Opportunities and Design Implications

extractions.description: This paper explores the use of Large Language Models (LLMs) in software tutorial writing. Through user studies with experienced technical writers, the paper examines how LLMs can assist in background research, resource creation, and maintaining quality standards in tutorial writing. It identifies challenges associated with LLMs, such as unpredictable output and difficulty in interface usability, and provides recommendations for designing LLM-based tutorial writing tools.

type.justification: The research involves user studies with technical writers to understand how LLMs can assist in software tutorial writing, making it an empirical study.
type.quote: In our work, we investigate how LLMs might be effective in meeting the needs of tutorial writers through a user study with seven technical writers...
